hydro_data::hydro_data_if Interface Reference

Generic interface for fetching hydrodynamic data. More...

Public Member Functions

subroutine hydro_data_if (flow, flow_lo, flow_hi, area, area_lo, area_hi, ncell, time, dx, dt)

Detailed Description

Generic interface for fetching hydrodynamic data.

Fill in hydrodynamic data. This data might be calculated from a function or provided by another module Note that continuity must be satisfied between time steps. The implementation must be provided by the driver or application

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

subroutine hydro_data::hydro_data_if::hydro_data_if ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  flow,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  flow_lo,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)
Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]timeTime of request
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
[out]flowCell and time centered flow
[out]flow_loLo face flow, time centered
[out]flow_hiHi face flow, time centered
[out]areaCell center area, old time
[out]area_loArea lo face, time centered
[out]area_hiArea hi face, time centered
